description: Jiei`s Hoothoot have been partners since they were young and it is seen perched outside of its Pok√© Ball on Jiei shoulders. When they were attacked by Misdreavus and Stantler while climbing the Bell Tower in Ecruteak City, it used Foresight to clear the illusion. It managed to see Ho-oh with Jiei when they reached the top of the tower.
name: Hoho (Jiei)
